sect1.title: $cache_modified_check
sect1.para: If set to &true;, Smarty will respect the If-Modified-Since header sent from the client. If the cached file timestamp has not changed since the last visit, then a '304: Not Modified' header will be sent instead of the content. This works only on cached content without {insert} tags.
See also $caching, $cache_lifetime, $cache_handler_func, and the caching section.
